= McVirt Release Procedure =

* Merge the branch to be released to the trunk
* Ensure that Jenkins build for the trunk succeeds
* Copy the package, built by Jenkins, from the Jenkins workspace onto the software repository on orion.
* Update the software repository, following wiki:SoftwareRepository#AptdebRepository
* Update the version of McVirt to be installed in the McVirt puppet module and rollout to metis
* Run puppet on McVirt host
